评论概述: Use the vise carefully!  Excellent watch
评论详情: I love the watch.  However, use care when removing stainless-steel band links.  Fortunately, they include good directions and a small tool (a compression vise) to push out the band-link pins.  However, you need (1) good light, (2) good eyes, and (3) care to center the watch band in the vise.  If the watch band is not centered in the vise, you will damage the vise.  You cannot remove band links without the vise.

I didn't buy this watch only because I can't shower with it. It looked like the perfect watch. Any watch I buy must be at least 5 ATM because I refuse to take off a bunch of jewelry before my showers and swimming. I only wear piercing jewelry, or gold/silver, or water resistant watches for this reason. Makes life much easier.  Please, Olevs, upgrade your water resistance on your watches and you will have a lot more customers! You have beautiful watches. They rival Casio and Armitron because they are more up-to-date with fashion.

Every day loses approx 6 minutes. Does not keep accurate time

This watch looks and feels amazing. I thought the reflection would be annoying on the diamond shaped glass but it's actually not a problem and looks very classy. I've had multiple compliments wearing this watch. My problems came in when setting up the watch. To adjust the band, using the tool to take the pins out was very easy, but getting them back in was a pain. The tool would not stay straight when twisting, but it came with two replacement peices for the tool. One of the links connecting to the clasp is very tight. Switching out the link next to it helped a little, but it's still tight and doesn't move losely. Clasping that peice also takes alot more effort to push and clicks louder than the other side. Instructions for changing date and time is very simple, but doesn't explain when. I had to change the date every day and it wouldn't change correctly on its own. After a couple days I figured out you have to set it a day ahead, then change the time backwards so the time is aligned with the date. Overall it's a great, appealing, quality watch, adjusting the band, date, and time we're the biggest problems.
Very happy with this purchase. It is a very nice watch for the price.
